citation.case_name: Exxon Mobil Corp. v. Allapattah Services, Inc.

html:
543 U.S. 924

EXXON MOBIL CORP.
v.
ALLAPATTAH SERVICES, INC., ET AL.

No. 04-70.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 12, 2004.

1

C. A. 11th Cir.; Certiorari in No. 04-70 granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition. Certiorari in No. 04-79 granted. Cases consolidated, and a total of 90 minutes is allotted for oral argument. Reported below: 04-70, 333 F.3d 1248; No. 04-79, 370 F.3d 124.
